TABLEATTRIBUTE.NAME: Sql Query
TABLEATTRIBUTE.VALUE:
WITH stg_advert_clause AS ( SELECT AD_ID , CLIPPER_VERSION , BOOK_ID , BOOK_EDITION , UDAC , PRODUCT_NAME , WORK_ITEM_ID , DENSE_RANK() OVER (PARTITION BY WORK_ITEM_ID ORDER BY BATCHNUM) as rank_no FROM STG_ADVERT)
SELECT T_TMP_CURR_STATUS_WI.P_AD_ID , T_TMP_CURR_STATUS_WI.P_CLIPPER_VERSION , T_TMP_CURR_STATUS_WI.P_UDAC , T_TMP_CURR_STATUS_WI.ALLOCATION_TYPE , T_TMP_CURR_STATUS_WI.TASK_NAME , T_TMP_CURR_STATUS_WI.STATUS , T_TMP_CURR_STATUS_WI.STATUS_TIMESTAMP , T_TMP_CURR_STATUS_WI.ACTIVE_USER_NAME , T_TMP_CURR_STATUS_WI.ALLOCATE_USER_NAME , T_TMP_CURR_STATUS_WI.LOCATION_NAME , T_TMP_CURR_STATUS_WI.WORKITEM_ID , T_TMP_CURR_STATUS_WI.ERR_CODE , T_TMP_CURR_STATUS_WI.TRANSACTION_TIMESTAMP , stg_advert_clause.AD_ID , stg_advert_clause.CLIPPER_VERSION , stg_advert_clause.BOOK_ID , stg_advert_clause.BOOK_EDITION , stg_advert_clause.UDAC , stg_advert_clause.PRODUCT_NAME
FROM T_TMP_CURR_STATUS_WI join stg_advert_clause on T_TMP_CURR_STATUS_WI.WORKITEM_ID=stg_advert_clause.WORK_ITEM_ID and stg_advert_clause.rank_no=1

TABLEATTRIBUTE.NAME: Lookup Sql Override
TABLEATTRIBUTE.VALUE: select ADVERT_KEY as RETURN_DIM_KEY , AD_ID as IDENTIFIED_COL from DIM_ADVERT where END_EFFECTIVE_DATE=to_date($$END_EFFECTIVE_DATE,'DD-MM-YYYY') and CURRENT_VERSION='Y'

TABLEATTRIBUTE.NAME: Lookup Sql Override
TABLEATTRIBUTE.VALUE: select TASK_KEY as RETURN_DIM_KEY , TASK_NAME as IDENTIFIED_COL from DIM_TASK where END_EFFECTIVE_DATE=to_date($$END_EFFECTIVE_DATE,'DD-MM-YYYY')

TABLEATTRIBUTE.NAME: Lookup Sql Override
TABLEATTRIBUTE.VALUE: select BOOK_KEY as RETURN_DIM_KEY , BOOK_NAME as IDENTIFIED_COL from DIM_BOOK where END_EFFECTIVE_DATE=to_date($$END_EFFECTIVE_DATE,'DD-MM-YYYY')

TABLEATTRIBUTE.NAME: Lookup Sql Override
TABLEATTRIBUTE.VALUE: select SALES_CLOSE_DATE_KEY as RETURN_DIM_KEY , BOOK_NAME as IDENTIFIED_COL from DIM_BOOK where END_EFFECTIVE_DATE=to_date($$END_EFFECTIVE_DATE,'DD-MM-YYYY')

TABLEATTRIBUTE.NAME: Lookup Sql Override
TABLEATTRIBUTE.VALUE: select LOCALITY_KEY as RETURN_DIM_KEY , DESCRIPTION as IDENTIFIED_COL from DIM_LOCALITY where END_EFFECTIVE_DATE=to_date($$END_EFFECTIVE_DATE,'DD-MM-YYYY')

TABLEATTRIBUTE.NAME: Lookup Sql Override
TABLEATTRIBUTE.VALUE: select DATE_KEY as RETURN_DIM_KEY , CALENDAR_QUARTER as IDENTIFIED_COL , DATE_STAMP as END_DATE from CLP_DATE_DIM

TABLEATTRIBUTE.NAME: Lookup Sql Override
TABLEATTRIBUTE.VALUE: select PRODUCT_KEY as RETURN_DIM_KEY , PRODUCT as IDENTIFIED_COL from PRODUCT_DIM where END_EFFECTIVE_DATE=to_date($$END_EFFECTIVE_DATE,'DD-MM-YYYY')
